name: Birth Antz
description:
My best friend has very extreme musical tastes. He loves Tchaikovsky and Canibal Corpse!

This experiment is a birthday gift composed and programmed by me, trying to capture their world in a very small format.

Also, with this creation, I participate in the challenge "Saladitos" of MálagaJam for "Transformation" and "Gift", the themes of November and December respectively.
